etymology.description: 乌(wū) + 鲁(lǔ) + 木(mù) + 齐(qí) + 市(shì) = phonetic transcription of “Ürümqi” + city suffix.
etymology.interpretation: Denotes the city of Urumqi, capital of Xinjiang; characters are selected for sound rather than meaning, with 市 indicating administrative status.
etymology.simplification: PRC simplifications: 烏→乌, 魯→鲁, 齊→齐; 木、市 unchanged. Simplified forms are standard in mainland toponyms.

parts.english: crude; blunt; State of Lu (ancient); surname

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市是新疆的首府(烏魯木齊市是新疆的首府)。
examples.pinyin: Wūlǔmùqí Shì shì Xīnjiāng de shǒufǔ.
examples.english: Urumqi is the capital of Xinjiang.

examples.chinese: 我明天去乌鲁木齐市旅行(我明天去烏魯木齊市旅行)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān qù Wūlǔmùqí Shì lǚxíng.
examples.english: I will travel to Urumqi tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市的气候干燥(烏魯木齊市的氣候乾燥)。
